"apangus" wrote:
>
> I am modeling a REST API and part of the API will represent resources
> that are organized into an arbitrary hierarchy of nodes with values
> and sub-nodes (kind of like a file system or the windows registry).
> 

Or an Atom Feed, or Google Sitemaps... choose the correct media type
for the task at hand, rather than trying to make your chosen media type
do things for which it was not designed.

-Eric
